frontmatter.title: Using Events and Delegates in Unity
frontmatter.excerpt: Events and Delegates allow you notify other classes when a certain action happens. This writing will try to explain what events and delegates are and how to use them.

frontmatter.title: Virtual Memory
frontmatter.excerpt: All modern OS have virtual memory implemented. I came across virtual memory when I was worried something was wrong with my RAM and I found it to be interesting. It gives a program the illusion of continuous and infinite memory.

frontmatter.title: The Workings of an Artificial Neural Network
frontmatter.excerpt: Artificial neural networks can be trained to do some amazing things, like recognizing faces, playing games, and so on. These tasks are very challenging, if not impossible, to do without using neural networks.
